name: Apple Stock Prediction
desc: Used the SARIMA model in R to analyze Apple's stock price data and predict its future trend.

name: Anomaly Detection
desc: Designed and trained an advanced machine learning model to detect security incidents, followed by its integration with Flask.

name: Churn Detection
desc: Developed a machine learning model to detect customer churn, helping businesses identify and retain at-risk customers. Utilized advanced feature engineering techniques and various classification algorithms.

name: Rename Shell Script
desc: A bash script I created to rename and manage files in Linux.

name: ArtMart
desc: ArtMart is a comprehensive platform available on desktop, web, and mobile devices. It consists of a Symfony and Java-based mobile web application designed for purchasing artwork and submitting artistic projects.

name: Hogwart University
desc: Hogwart University is an online learning platform that helps students studying during the pandemic.

name: NexTech
desc: NexTech is a shopping application that helps customers buy the latest technology and leave reviews.

name: Veneficus
desc: Veneficus is a 2D game developed using C and the SDL library under Linux/Ubuntu.

name: Intelligent Trading Agent
desc: Portfolio optimization on the Tunisian stock market, combining deep learning and quantitative methods. Deployed with Django and Dash/Plotly. Integrated sentiment analysis to assess market sentiment and improve prediction models. Created Power BI dashboards for comprehensive data visualization.
